description.english: Embed a core rune
description.schinese: 镶嵌一枚核心符文
description.tchinese: 鑲嵌一枚核心符文

description.english: Become a hero once in the game
description.schinese: 在游戏中累计变成1次英雄
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中累計變成1次英雄

description.english: Become a hero 10 times in total in the game.
description.schinese: 在游戏中累计变成10次英雄
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中累計變成10次英雄

description.english: Become a hero 25 times in total in the game.
description.schinese: 在游戏中累计变成25次英雄
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中累計變成25次英雄

description.english: Become a hero 50 times in total in the game.
description.schinese: 在游戏中累计变成50次英雄
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中累計變成50次英雄

description.english: Become a hero 100 times in total in the game.
description.schinese: 在游戏中累计变成100次英雄
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中累計變成100次英雄

description.english: Accumulate 1 cooperative control of the boss in the game.
description.schinese: 在游戏中累计协同控制1次BOSS
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中累計協同控制1次BOSS

description.english: Accumulate 10 cooperative control of the boss in the game.
description.schinese: 在游戏中累计协同控制10次BOSS
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中累計協同控制10次BOSS

description.english: Accumulate 25 cooperative control of the boss in the game.
description.schinese: 在游戏中累计协同控制25次BOSS
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中累計協同控制25次BOSS

description.english: Accumulate 50 cooperative control of the boss in the game.
description.schinese: 在游戏中累计协同控制50次BOSS
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中累計協同控制50次BOSS

description.english: Accumulate 100 cooperative control of the boss in the game.
description.schinese: 在游戏中累计协同控制100次BOSS
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中累計協同控制100次BOSS

description.english: Defeat a total of 50 heroes or monsters in the game.
description.schinese: 在游戏中累计击败50名英雄或怪物
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中累計擊敗50名英雄或怪物

description.english: Defeat a total of 250 heroes or monsters in the game.
description.schinese: 在游戏中累计击败250名英雄或怪物
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中累計擊敗250名英雄或怪物

description.english: Defeat a total of 500 heroes or monsters in the game.
description.schinese: 在游戏中累计击败500名英雄或怪物
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中累計擊敗500名英雄或怪物

description.english: Defeat a total of 750 heroes or monsters in the game.
description.schinese: 在游戏中累计击败750名英雄或怪物
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中累計擊敗750名英雄或怪物

description.english: Defeat a total of 1000 heroes or monsters in the game.
description.schinese: 在游戏中累计击败1000名英雄或怪物
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中累計擊敗1000名英雄或怪物

description.english: Defeat a total of 1500 heroes or monsters in the game.
description.schinese: 在游戏中累计击败1500名英雄或怪物
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中累計擊敗1500名英雄或怪物

description.english: Embedded with 1 page of runes
description.schinese: 嵌满1页符文页
description.tchinese: 嵌滿1頁符文頁

description.english: Embedded with 2 page of runes
description.schinese: 嵌满2页符文页
description.tchinese: 嵌滿2頁符文頁

description.english: Embedded with 3 page of runes
description.schinese: 嵌满3页符文页
description.tchinese: 嵌滿3頁符文頁

description.english: Possess 1 hero with full talents
description.schinese: 拥有1名满天赋的英雄
description.tchinese: 擁有1名滿天賦的英雄

description.english: Possess 2 hero with full talents
description.schinese: 拥有2名满天赋的英雄
description.tchinese: 擁有2名滿天賦的英雄

description.english: Possess 3 hero with full talents
description.schinese: 拥有3名满天赋的英雄
description.tchinese: 擁有3名滿天賦的英雄

description.english: Possess 1 set of fully unlocked monster trees
description.schinese: 拥有1组满解锁怪物树
description.tchinese: 擁有1組滿解鎖怪物樹

description.english: Possess 3 set of fully unlocked monster trees
description.schinese: 拥有3组满解锁怪物树
description.tchinese: 擁有3組滿解鎖怪物樹

description.english: Possess 5 set of fully unlocked monster trees
description.schinese: 拥有5组满解锁怪物树
description.tchinese: 擁有5組滿解鎖怪物樹

description.english: Become a monster once in the game.
description.schinese: 在游戏中累计变成1次怪物
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中累計變成1次怪物

description.english: Become a monster 10 times in total in the game.
description.schinese: 在游戏中累计变成10次怪物
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中累計變成10次怪物

description.english: Become a monster 25 times in total in the game.
description.schinese: 在游戏中累计变成25次怪物
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中累計變成25次怪物

description.english: Become a monster 50 times in total in the game.
description.schinese: 在游戏中累计变成50次怪物
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中累計變成50次怪物

description.english: Become a monster 100 times in total in the game.
description.schinese: 在游戏中累计变成100次怪物
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中累計變成100次怪物

description.english: Become a monster 150 times in total in the game.
description.schinese: 在游戏中累计变成150次怪物
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中累計變成150次怪物

description.english: Won a total of 1 game
description.schinese: 累计赢得1场游戏
description.tchinese: 累計贏得1場遊戲

description.english: Won a total of 5 game
description.schinese: 累计赢得5场游戏
description.tchinese: 累計贏得5場遊戲

description.english: Won a total of 10 game
description.schinese: 累计赢得10场游戏
description.tchinese: 累計贏得10場遊戲

description.english: Won a total of 20 game
description.schinese: 累计赢得20场游戏
description.tchinese: 累計贏得20場遊戲

description.english: Won a total of 40 game
description.schinese: 累计赢得40场游戏
description.tchinese: 累計贏得40場遊戲

description.english: Won a total of 80 game
description.schinese: 累计赢得80场游戏
description.tchinese: 累計贏得80場遊戲

description.english: Complete the first round of combat.
description.schinese: 完成第一局对战
description.tchinese: 完成第一局對戰

description.english: Defeat the boss Mo Shi Huang Sha as a hero.
description.schinese: 作为英雄击败BOSS漠世黄沙
description.tchinese: 作為英雄擊敗BOSS漠世黃沙

displayName.english: Experts: Clear away the yellow sand

description.english: Defeat the boss Mo Shi Huang Sha as a hero with at least 50% health remaining.
description.schinese: 作为英雄以不低于50%的生命值击败BOSS漠世黄沙
description.tchinese: 作為英雄以不低於50%的生命值擊敗BOSS漠世黃沙

description.english: Cooperative control BOSS Mo Shi Huang Sha Defeat the hero
description.schinese: 合作控制BOSS漠世黄沙击败英雄
description.tchinese: 合作控制BOSS漠世黃沙擊敗英雄

description.english: Defeat the boss, the Hundred Beasts Hybrid, as a hero.
description.schinese: 作为英雄击败BOSS百兽混合
description.tchinese: 作為英雄擊敗BOSS百獸混合

description.english: Defeat the Boss Hundred Beasts Mix as a hero with at least 50% health remaining.
description.schinese: 作为英雄以不低于50%的生命值击败BOSS百兽混合
description.tchinese: 作為英雄以不低於50%的生命值擊敗BOSS百獸混合

description.english: Cooperative control BOSS Hundred Beasts Mixed Defeat Hero
description.schinese: 合作控制BOSS百兽混合击败英雄
description.tchinese: 合作控制BOSS百獸混合擊敗英雄

description.english: As a hero, defeat three monsters in a row in the room while maintaining at least 80% health.
description.schinese: 作为英雄，在房间里连续战胜三个怪物且血量不低于80%
description.tchinese: 作為英雄，在房間里連續戰勝三個怪物且血量不低於80%

displayName.english: Easy to dodge an open attack?

description.english: As a ghost, use mechanisms to defeat heroes.
description.schinese: 作为幽灵，使用机关击败英雄
description.tchinese: 作為幽靈，使用機關擊敗英雄

description.english: In a single game, as a hero, all equipment pieces must be of orange quality.
description.schinese: 一局游戏中，作为英雄所有部位包含橙色品质的装备
description.tchinese: 一局遊戲中，作為英雄所有部位包含橙色品質的裝備

description.english: As a hero, collect invitations on the “Restaurant Floor.”
description.schinese: 作为英雄，在【餐厅层】收集到请柬
description.tchinese: 作為英雄，在【餐廳層】收集到請柬

description.english: As a ghost, play the role of the Tooth Fairy in the “Junk Layer” and kill heroes.
description.schinese: 作为幽灵，在【杂物层】扮演牙仙击杀英雄
description.tchinese: 作為幽靈，在【雜物層】扮演牙仙擊殺英雄

description.english: As a hero, enter the hidden room in the junk room and open the tooth fairy treasure chest.
description.schinese: 作为英雄，在【杂物层】进入隐藏房间并开启牙仙宝箱
description.tchinese: 作為英雄，在【雜物層】進入隱藏房間並開啟牙仙寶箱

displayName.english: It's hard to guard against hidden dangers.

description.english: As a ghost, hit the hero once with the operating mechanism.
description.schinese: 作为幽灵，操作机关命中英雄1次
description.tchinese: 作為幽靈，操作機關命中英雄1次

displayName.english: It's hard to guard against hidden dangers 2

description.english: As a ghost, hit the hero 10 times with the operating mechanism.
description.schinese: 作为幽灵，操作机关命中英雄10次
description.tchinese: 作為幽靈，操作機關命中英雄10次

displayName.english: It's hard to guard against hidden dangers 3

description.english: As a ghost, hit the hero 40 times with the operating mechanism.
description.schinese: 作为幽灵，操作机关命中英雄40次
description.tchinese: 作為幽靈，操作機關命中英雄40次

displayName.english: It's hard to guard against hidden dangers 4

description.english: As a ghost, hit the hero 70 times with the operating mechanism.
description.schinese: 作为幽灵，操作机关命中英雄70次
description.tchinese: 作為幽靈，操作機關命中英雄70次

displayName.english: It's hard to guard against hidden dangers 5

description.english: As a ghost, hit the hero 100 times with the operating mechanism.
description.schinese: 作为幽灵，操作机关命中英雄100次
description.tchinese: 作為幽靈，操作機關命中英雄100次

displayName.english: It's hard to guard against hidden dangers 6

description.english: As a ghost, hit the hero 150 times with the operating mechanism.
description.schinese: 作为幽灵，操作机关命中英雄150次
description.tchinese: 作為幽靈，操作機關命中英雄150次

description.english: As a hero, find a way to turn off the fountain in the foyer.
description.schinese: 作为英雄，找到方法关闭【门厅】的喷泉
description.tchinese: 作為英雄，找到方法關閉【門廳】的噴泉

description.english: As a hero, find a way to enter the VIP room on the restaurant floor and enjoy a meal.
description.schinese: 作为英雄，找到方法进入【餐厅层】的贵宾室并用餐
description.tchinese: 作為英雄，找到方法進入【餐廳層】的貴賓室並用餐

description.english: As a hero, find a way to enter the hidden room in the junk room and complete the mechanism.
description.schinese: 作为英雄，找到方法进入【杂物层】的隐藏房间并完成机制内容
description.tchinese: 作為英雄，找到方法進入【雜物層】的隱藏房間並完成機制內容

description.english: As a hero, find a way to repair the power system of the Haunted House Floor.
description.schinese: 作为英雄，找到方法修复【鬼屋层】的电力系统
description.tchinese: 作為英雄，找到方法修復【鬼屋層】的電力系統

description.english: As a hero, complete 1 hidden mechanism on a floor in the game.
description.schinese: 作为英雄，在游戏中累计完成1次楼层隐藏机关
description.tchinese: 作為英雄，在遊戲中累計完成1次樓層隱藏機關

description.english: As a hero, complete 5 hidden mechanism on a floor in the game.
description.schinese: 作为英雄，在游戏中累计完成5次楼层隐藏机关
description.tchinese: 作為英雄，在遊戲中累計完成5次樓層隱藏機關

description.english: As a hero, complete 10 hidden mechanism on a floor in the game.
description.schinese: 作为英雄，在游戏中累计完成10次楼层隐藏机关
description.tchinese: 作為英雄，在遊戲中累計完成10次樓層隱藏機關

description.english: As a hero, complete 25 hidden mechanism on a floor in the game.
description.schinese: 作为英雄，在游戏中累计完成25次楼层隐藏机关
description.tchinese: 作為英雄，在遊戲中累計完成25次樓層隱藏機關

description.english: As a hero, complete 50 hidden mechanism on a floor in the game.
description.schinese: 作为英雄，在游戏中累计完成50次楼层隐藏机关
description.tchinese: 作為英雄，在遊戲中累計完成50次樓層隱藏機關

description.english: As a hero, complete 100 hidden mechanism on a floor in the game.
description.schinese: 作为英雄，在游戏中累计完成100次楼层隐藏机关
description.tchinese: 作為英雄，在遊戲中累計完成100次樓層隱藏機關

description.english: As a hero, you completed either the “restaurant floor” dining experience or the “miscellaneous floor” equipment selection in a single game.
description.schinese: 作为英雄，在一次游戏中完成了【餐厅层】用餐和【杂物层】的装备二选一
description.tchinese: 作為英雄，在一次遊戲中完成了【餐廳層】用餐和【雜物層】的裝備二選一

description.english: As a hero, consume each of the three foods in the Restaurant Floor once.
description.schinese: 作为英雄，累计食用【餐厅层】的三种食物各一次
description.tchinese: 作為英雄，累計食用【餐廳層】的三種食物各一次

description.english: In one game, select one card of each quality level.
description.schinese: 一次游戏中选择所有品质的升层卡片各一张
description.tchinese: 一次遊戲中選擇所有品質的升層卡片各一張

description.english: Select the “Choose Again” card to advance to the next level, then draw another “Choose Again” card.
description.schinese: 选择再次抉择升层卡片，随后又刷出了一张再次抉择
description.tchinese: 選擇再次抉擇升層卡片，隨後又刷出了一張再次抉擇

description.english: In one game, choose the bottom card, the next time choose a better one, and give me the three best cards to move up a level.
description.schinese: 一次游戏中选择压箱底、下一次更好、给我最好的三张升层卡片
description.tchinese: 一次遊戲中選擇壓箱底、下一次更好、給我最好的三張升層卡片

description.english: In a single game, select two level-up cards: Combat Training I and Combat Training II.
description.schinese: 一次游戏中选择战斗训练I、战斗训练II两张升层卡片
description.tchinese: 一次遊戲中選擇戰鬥訓練I、戰鬥訓練II兩張升層卡片

description.english: In one game, select two level-up cards: Defense Training I and Defense Training II.
description.schinese: 一次游戏中选择防御训练I、防御训练II两张升层卡片
description.tchinese: 一次遊戲中選擇防禦訓練I、防禦訓練II兩張升層卡片

description.english: In a single game, select three level-up cards: Welcome Ceremony, Glorious Infusion, and Baptism.
description.schinese: 一次游戏中选择迎宾礼、光辉灌注、洗礼三张升层卡片
description.tchinese: 一次遊戲中選擇迎賓禮、光輝灌注、洗禮三張升層卡片

description.english: In one game, choose three level-up cards: Crisis Premonition, Long-Term Disrepair, and Darkness Overload.
description.schinese: 一次游戏中选择危机预感、年久失修、黑暗过载三张升层卡片
description.tchinese: 一次遊戲中選擇危機預感、年久失修、黑暗過載三張升層卡片

description.english: In one game, select the Panic Messenger and Dark Ascension two level-up cards.
description.schinese: 一次游戏中选择恐慌使者、黑暗升腾两张升层卡片
description.tchinese: 一次遊戲中選擇恐慌使者、黑暗升騰兩張升層卡片

description.english: Complete the tutorial
description.schinese: 完成新手引导
description.tchinese: 完成新手引導
